name: Cheddar and Spinach Pinwheels
author: Lauryn Macdonald
summary: Cheesy, creamy spinach, and jalapenos are rolled up in a log of puff pastry and sliced into easy appetizer pinwheels that bake in a snap!
ingredients: ¾ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature
½ (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Mix cream cheese and jalapenos with a fork in a medium bowl until blended
Season mixture with salt and pepper
Roll puff pastry out onto your work surface
Spread cream cheese mixture over pastry until evenly distributed
Sprinkle Cheddar cheese evenly on top
Roll puff pastry into a log, pressing seams to seal
Wrap in plastic wrap and freeze for 20 minutes
Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Unwrap and slice log into 1/4-inch rounds
Place rounds onto the baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes
